post.author: Admin
post.title: Contest Hoodie Orders Due Wednesday
post.description: Dear Band Families, This is just a reminder that the last day to order Contest Hoodies or join B
post.content:
Dear Band Families,

This is just a reminder that the last day to order Contest Hoodies or join Boosters at the Grand Staff Level is this Wednesday (September 10). Because we order the exact number from the silk screener, late orders cannot be accepted and there will not be any extra for sale later. If you want a contest hoodie please make sure to order before Wednesday. The membership and contest hoodie order forms are attached if you still need one. If you have any questions, please contact Shirley Berish at 440-717-1532.

Thanks!

ContestHoodieOrderForm.pdf (216.1KB)

MembershipForm2014.pdf (96KB)
